mapper.select: SELECT workNo , mbrId , custId , if (isnull(w.objtNo), '', (select objtTp from saleobject o where w.objtNo = o.objtNo )) objtTp , if (isnull(w.objtNo), '', (select saleTp from saleobject o where w.objtNo = o.objtNo )) saleTp , objtNo , workTitle , workContent , endDateYn , DATE_FORMAT(endDt, '%Y-%m-%d') as endDt , DATE_FORMAT(frstRegDt, '%Y-%m-%d %I:%i:%s') as frstRegDt , (select mbrNm from member m where w.frstRegUser = m.mbrId) mbrNm , frstRegUser , DATE_FORMAT(scheduledDt, '%Y-%m-%d') as scheduledDt , case when #{user.mbrTp} = 'MT004' then 'Y' ELSE ( case when w.frstRegUser = #{user.mbrId} then 'Y' else 'N' END ) END deleteBtnYn FROM workdoc w WHERE 1=1 AND workNo=#{selectedWorkNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE w, dir FROM workdoc AS w LEFT JOIN direction AS dir ON dir.workNo = w.workNo WHERE w.workNo = #{workNo}
mapper.select: SELECT o.objtNo , o.objtNm , o.objtTp , (select commNm from commcd where commCd = o.objtTp ) objtTpNm , o.saleTp , (select commNm from commcd where commCd = o.saleTp ) saleTpNm , (select roadAddrPart1 from building b where o.buildCd = b.buildCd ) addr , CAST(area AS signed integer) area , CAST(bargainAmt AS signed integer) bargainAmt , CAST(depositAmt AS signed integer) depositAmt , CAST(monthlyAmt AS signed integer) monthlyAmt , i.interNo , case when #{user.mbrTp} = 'MT004' then 'Y' ELSE ( case when i.frstRegUser = #{user.mbrId} then 'Y' else 'N' END ) END deleteBtnYn FROM saleobject o , interobject i WHERE 1=1 AND i.custId = #{custId} AND o.objtNo = i.objtNo
